'''Gusto-Frosto''' is an event-exclusive variant of the '''Whirling Cryo Fungus''' that appears in the [[Fungus Mechanicus]] event.

==Stats==
{{Enemy Stats
|hide_notes = 1

|cryo_res = 20%
|dendro_res = 20%

|hp_ratio  = 2.7
|hp_type   = 2
|atk_ratio = 4.32
|atk_type  = 2
}}

==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy       = Whirling Cryo Fungus

|name_1      = Skill: Frosty Vortex
|desc_1      = Condenses the power of Cryo to unleash an Ice Vortex. While the Ice Vortex remains on the field, it will continuously deal '''300% ATK''' as {{Color|Cryo DMG}} to nearby opponents every second for 4 seconds.
|file_1      = Whirling Cryo Fungus Frosty Vortex

|name_2      = Icy Strike
|desc_2      = Unleashes 2 swift melee strikes, dealing '''100% ATK × 2''' as {{Color|Cryo DMG}}.
|file_2      = Whirling Cryo Fungus Icy Strike 2

|name_3      = Delayed Freezing
|desc_3      = When attacked, restores '''5%''' of Max [[HP]] to self. This can only occur once every 0.1 seconds.
}}

==Trivia==
* The Spanish name for this Fungus is a reference to ''[[w:c:es.plantsvszombies:Petaseta|Petaseta]]'', the Spanish name for the [[w:c:plantsvszombies:Doom-shroom (PvZ)|Doom-shroom]], a character from ''{{w|Plants vs. Zombies}}''.
